result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston.  Attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Doctor's Report Return.
Parties received the competency evaluation extension letter efiled with the Court on 10/17/2022. For reasons set forth in the record, defense objects to the extension and requests a DRR within 30 days of the competency evaluation report filed. Court grants request.
Court ordered case adjourned for Doctor's Report Return in Branch 13.
Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Competency Evaluation Extension Letter, filed.
Court rescheduled return on doctor's report due to a delay with the order for competency exam.  Parties notified of new date.  Doctor's report return scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 2:30 pm.
Signed and Filed.
All previously ordered conditions remain.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston not in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston.  Attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for State of Wisconsin. Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Bail motion by the state argued and granted by the Court.  Court sets $1000 cash bail. All previously ordered conditions remain. Case remains calendared in Branch 13.
All previously ordered conditions of bail remain in full effect.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston not in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston.  Attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference.  State informed the Court that the defendant was found not competent to proceed in his open Waukesha County matters and Corporation Counsel will not move forward with Chapter 51 commitment of the defendant.  State requests a new competency examination of the defendant.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.  Court set a return on doctor's report date.  Defense requests a bail/bond hearing.  Court set date as requested.  Court set a $100 signature bond at this time.  Case adjourned to Branch 13.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston not in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for review hearing. Discussion held. Court orders case adjourned for a status pending Corp Counsel decision. Case remains calendared in Br 13.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Attorney Corey Flynn appeared in Court. Thomas Hasle appeared in Court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Allante Stubbs-Harlston not in Court, In Custody.
Case in Court to address the State's Motion for Warrant efiled 9/14/2022. Parties confirmed that defendant was taken into custody.
Court ordered case adjourned for the next scheduled court date previously calendared.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in custody.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has proceedings pending outcome of Waukesha County matter 22CM372. Court stays any findings on the case.  Court adjourns matter for review hearing upon completion of Waukesha County competencing hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 37.    All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Review hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in custody.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for hearing. Court finds defendant is unlikely to regain competency. Court ordered defendant discharged from commitment and STAYS Ch.51 proceeding pending outcome of Waukesha County matter 22CM372. Court orders defendant transported to Waukesha County Jail for competency hearing dated 06/20/2022. Court adjourns matter for further proceedings upon completion of Waukesha County competencing hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 37.  Review hearing scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
signed and filed.
forwarded to court for review

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn. Defendant in custody at Mendota. Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston appeared by video means with Attorney. Case in court for Doctor's Report Return. Court reviewed Doctor DeBoer's report with parties. State and Defense do not challenge report. Court held colloquy with defendant who does not challenge the report. Court ordered case adjourned for final entry of findings hearing in Branch 37.  Hearing scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
from Dr. DeBoer, received and filed.
Cover Sheet for Dr. DeBoer report, received and filed.
Forthwith Order, signed and filed
forwarded to court

records.descr: DE not competent to stand trial, case suspended

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Case in court with defendant's cases 21CM2162/2969/4115 & 22CM29.  Court finds that competency is raised on all the cases with defense in agreement.  Competency hearing proceeded. Parties in receipt of examiner's report. Defense has challenged Dr. Pankiewicz's report.  Parties stipulate to Dr. Pankiewicz's qualifications to testify as an expert in the field of psychology.   Sworn for the State:  Dr. Pankiewicz.  Testimony closed.  Arguments heard. After review of all evidence, report and testimony of Dr. Pankiewicz, Court finds the defendant lacks substantial capacity to understand court proceedings or to assist in his own defense.  Court orders proceedings suspended.   Court ordered defendant committed to the Department of Health and Family Services for Institutional Care in order to restore competency within the statutory time frame . The Court does not authorize DHS to administer medications at this time.  Order of Commitment signed and filed.  Defendant is REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department for transportation to the designated facility. FORTHWITH. 
Court orders case adjourned  back to Branch 37 for Competency Review Hearing  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Court reviewed the report with parties.  Court held colloquy with defendant who challenges the report.  Matter remains calendered in Branch 37.  Competency hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Received and Filed.
Dr. Pankiewicz's report dated 3/16/2022, received and filed
Forensic evaluation ordered.  INITIAL APPEARANCE NOT HELD.  Trial court to address INITIAL APPEARANCE on next court date.

Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in court with attorney Jason A Findling.  Defendant Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Allante Jovan Stubbs Harlston appeared by video means with Attorney.  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Order for Competency Examination, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
